about_the_game:
Labyrinth is a 2D platformer with pixel art graphics in which you will have to find your way through intricate labyrinths, overcome many enemies and deadly traps.
Trade potions with merchants or go to the blacksmith to have your armor repaired, go in search of hidden treasures or ancient magical scrolls.
Open secret passages, stairs or magical gates to facilitate your next rebirth and find the exit of the Labyrinth!
A powerful Necromancer is gathering an army to conquer the nearby lands,
many heroes set out with the aim of killing the Necromancer,
but none of them ever returned, you are one of them.

Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Xeon E3 1245
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: geforce gt 1030
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 234 MB available space
